      • OnClickSaveButton

        public void OnClickSaveButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method gathers all of the inputted information, performs time formatting and conversions, inputs the data into the database, and returns the user to the Customer Page. The time data is collected using now(), converted to UTC, formatted using the DateTimeFormatter, then converted to a timestamp for the database. The DivisionID is collected using a method in my FirstLevelDivisions model that matches the inputted state to its DivisionID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • OnClickBackButton

        public void OnClickBackButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method returns the user to the Customer Page when they click the "Back" button
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • OnSelectCountry

                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method listens for a selection in the Country ComboBox, then limits the states/provinces that populate into the State ComboBox by using the getStateFromCountryName method in my FirstLevelDivisions model
